/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a driver's viewpoint on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The road is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. On either side of the road, there are trees and buildings, adding to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting with the blue of the sky and the various colors of the buildings and vehicles.
